sentences.sContent: An organism that generates heat to maintain its body temperature, typically above the temperature of its surroundings; a homeotherm.
sentences.sContent_eng: An organism that generates heat to maintain its body temperature, typically above the temperature of its surroundings; a homeotherm.
sentences.sCn: 恒温动物能产生热量维持体温的生物体，其体温典型高于其周围环境的温度；温血动物。
